questions.text: What is the largest ocean on Earth?
questions.explanation: The Pacific Ocean is the largest and deepest of Earth's oceanic divisions.

questions.text: Which country has the largest population?
questions.explanation: As of recent data, India has surpassed China to become the most populous country in the world.

questions.text: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital and most populous city of France.
